channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: AP analysis shows Texas and California redistricting efforts could mess with rare partisan balance
item.description: Moves by Texas Republicans and California Democrats to redraw their U.S. House districts could disrupt a rare partisan balance in American politics.

item.title: Florida must stop expanding ‘Alligator Alcatraz’ immigration center, judge says
Redistricting tug-of-war bounces back to Texas after California lawmakers counterpunch
